@PrinceManayBora I'm not sure what the offer is, so I simply created the first thing I could. I'm not sure if you saw my paper about rigorous mysticism, but I tried to embed the brand with the core ideas I outlined there.

One of the keys I push on: you don't know exactly what the future willâ€¦
